description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Carrots & Cauliflower recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Saut√©ed vegetable,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Low fat,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Spiced Carrots & Cauliflower Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper (to season)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel carrots and slice into 5mm thick sticks.

Heat butter in a frying pan. Add garlic and cumin seeds and cook for 2 minutes until aromatic. Add carrots and cauliflower and toss in pan to coat with cumin. Add stock and sugar and stir until sugar has dissolved.
Cover and cook for about 6 minutes until tender.
Transfer to a serving bowl, top with yoghurt and sprinkle over coriander. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
Serve with grilled fish or chicken.
